amendment.description: To ensure continued passenger rail operations on long-distance routes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3665 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3665 proposed by Senator Moran to Amendment SA 3399. (consideration: CR S5499-5503; text: CR S5502) To ensure continued passenger rail operations on long-distance routes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3665 proposed by Senator Moran to Amendment SA 3399.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3665 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
